BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 080300Z TO 150259Z SEP BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING 300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-14.25S 040-03.57W, 22-25.82S 039-58.93W,
   22-28.60S 039-58.80W, 22-18.03S 040-06.23W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 150359Z SEP 12.
